Before Installing export interface for Quick Report, Report Builder and Ace Reporter Please open "<eDocEngine InstallDir>\Source\gtExpIntf.inc “    file and Enable the corresponding report versions as per the instructions given in the file and save the file.

ACE Reporter
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

1.Open "<eDocEngine InstallDir>\Source\Ace\gtAceExpDIntf17.groupproj" in Delphi XE3.  

2. Right-click gtAceExpD17.bpl in the Project Manager and choose "Build" from the popup menu.

3. Do not close the IDE.

4. Please search for the file "gtAceExpD17.bpl" in your System and copy the file to  C:\Windows\System32 (In case of Windows 7(64 bit) Copy the File to  C:\Windows\SysWOW64)

5.Right-click DCLgtAceExpD17.bpl in the Project Manager and choose "Install" from the popup menu. 

DevExpress Printing System
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

1.Open "<eDocEngine InstallDir>\Source\DevExpress\gtXPressExpIntfD17.groupproj" in Delphi XE3.  

2. Right-click gtXPressExpD17.bpl in the Project Manager and choose "Build" from the popup menu.

3. Do not close the IDE.

4. Please search for the file "gtXPressExpD17.bpl" in your System and copy the file to  C:\Windows\System32 (In case of Windows 7(64 bit) Copy the File to  C:\Windows\SysWOW64)

5.Right-click DCLgtXPressExpD17.bpl in the Project Manager and choose "Install" from the popup menu. 

Fast Report
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

1.Open "<eDocEngine InstallDir>\Source\FR\gtFRExpIntfD17.groupproj" in Delphi XE3.  

2. Right-click gtFRExpD17.bpl in the Project Manager and choose "Build" from the popup menu.

3. Do not close the IDE.

4. Please search for the file "gtFRExpD17.bpl" in your System and copy the file to  C:\Windows\System32 (In case of Windows 7 (64 bit) Copy the File to  C:\Windows\SysWOW64)

5.Right-click DCLgtFRExpD17.bpl in the Project Manager and choose "Install" from the popup menu. 

Quick Report
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

1.Open "<eDocEngine InstallDir>\Source\QR\gtQRExpIntfD17.groupproj" in Delphi XE3.  

2. Right-click gtQRExpD17.bpl in the Project Manager and choose "Build" from the popup menu.

3. Do not close the IDE.

4. Please search for the file "gtQRExpD17.bpl" in your System and copy the file to  C:\Windows\System32 (In case of Windows 7(64 bit) Copy the File to  C:\Windows\SysWOW64)

5.Right-click DCLgtQRExpD17.bpl in the Project Manager and choose "Install" from the popup menu. 

ReportBuilder
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

1.Open "<eDocEngine InstallDir>\Source\RB\gtRBExpIntfD17.groupproj" in Delphi XE3.  

2. Right-click gtRBExpD17.bpl in the Project Manager and choose "Build" from the popup menu.

3. Do not close the IDE.

4. Please search for the file "gtRBExpD17.bpl" in your System and copy the file to  C:\Windows\System32 (In case of Windows 7 (64 bit) Copy the File to  C:\Windows\SysWOW64)

5.Right-click DCLgtRBExpD17.bpl in the Project Manager and choose "Install" from the popup menu. 

RichView
~~~~~~~~~

1.Open "<eDocEngine InstallDir>\Source\RichVw\gtRichVwExpIntfD17.groupproj" in Delphi XE3.  

2. Right-click gtRichVwExpD17.bpl in the Project Manager and choose "Build" from the popup menu.

3. Do not close the IDE.

4. Please search for the file "gtRichVwExpD17.bpl" in your System and copy the file to  C:\Windows\System32 (In case of Windows 7(64 bit) Copy the File to  C:\Windows\SysWOW64)

5.Right-click DCLgtRichVwExpD17.bpl in the Project Manager and choose "Install" from the popup menu. 


ScaleRichView
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

1.Open "<eDocEngine InstallDir>\Source\ScaleRichVw\gtScaleRichVwExpIntfD17.groupproj" in Delphi XE3.  

2. Right-click gtScaleRichVwExpD17.bpl in the Project Manager and choose "Build" from the popup menu.

3. Do not close the IDE.

4. Please search for the file "gtScaleRichVwExpD17.bpl" in your System and copy the file to  C:\Windows\System32 (In case of Windows 7(64 bit) Copy the File to  C:\Windows\SysWOW64)

5.Right-click DCLgtScaleRichVwExpD17.bpl in the Project Manager and choose "Install" from the popup menu. 

TMSGridPack
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

1.Open "<eDocEngine InstallDir>\Source\TMS\gtAdvGridExpIntfD17.groupproj" in Delphi XE3.  

2. Right-click gtAdvGridExpD17.bpl in the Project Manager and choose "Build" from the popup menu.

3. Do not close the IDE.

4. Please search for the file "gtAdvGridExpD17.bpl" in your System and copy the file to  C:\Windows\System32 (In case of Windows 7(64 bit) Copy the File to  C:\Windows\SysWOW64)

5.Right-click DCLgtAdvGridExpD17.bpl in the Project Manager and choose "Install" from the popup menu.
